I am a London-based software development engineer.

A recent King's College London CS graduate, currently working as a █████ at █████.

About me

  • I've worked at Amazon, making stuff for the Prime Video TV app that runs on 100's of millions devices
  • I graduated King's College London, earning various prizes for finishing each year of study with the best results in the Informatics department
  • I was a participant in the first Estonian Youth Polar Expedition (a fancy name for a trip to North Scandinavia)
  • I mainly work with Java and JavaScript (+ TypeScript) but I'm always learning new technologies.
  • More
    • I started my career by interning at Wise in the North America team

    • I was a Teaching Assistant for three modules at King's College, delivering over 120 structured tutorials to more than 400 students

Projects

A collection of things I've made over the years

  • laane.xyz

    Vanilla HTML/CSS/JS with some cool workarounds and hacks. Lighthouse score >90 in all categories.

  • laane.xyz server+domain

    IPv6, HTTP/2, TLSv1.3.

    Wildcard LetsEncrypt TLS certificate, forced HTTPS, wildcard email, DNSSEC, CloudWatch metrics.

  • Baltic Stocks

    Docker + MariaDB + Java + React (TypeScript). Aggregates stock data from Baltic exchanges and concisely displays them in one page.

  • DFA Algorithms

    TypeScript + React. Bachelor's project at King's College London. Implements and visualizes deterministic finite automata (DFA) equivalence testing and state minimization algorithms.

  • new-tab

    React + Sass. Minimalistic new-tab page with shortcuts and current TransferWise account balance.

  • favicon-marquee

    JavaScript. A <10 kB class with no dependencies that adds an animated scrolling favicon to your website.

  • Others

    Check out my GitHub profile for other projects and open-source contributions.
